title: Ella
description: Fourteen-year-old Ella Wallis is a typical unhappy teenager. Bullied at school, misunderstood by her family, she just wants to be left alone. But Ella has one thing most teenagers don' telekinetic powers. Ella doesn't know how she moves things without touching them, or even that she's doing it, but she is about to discover that this is only the beginning of her extraordinary gifts - gifts that can be used for good or for evil. Uri Geller is world-famous for his psychic powers; in thousands of television appearances, he has astounded audiences with his telekinetic prowess. He is the author of numerous titles, including My Story , The Geller Effect , and Change Your Life in One Day ; he has also been the subject of more than a dozen books.
author: Uri Geller
